title: Manhunt
additional-note: The online renewal record for 'Forever Yours: Short Story' by John D. MacDonald says it appeared in the February 1952 issue of Manhunt, which does not exist. FictionMags says MacDonald's 'Forever Yours' was published in the February 1953 issue of McCall's, not of Manhunt. We have not examined the issue in question.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
